item.title: Back up your Plex Media Server on Mac OS
item.description: The Challenge: How to automate the backing up of my Plex Media Server Solution: A Bash Script I wanted to automate this process. If I didn’t, it probably wouldn’t get done. This script was adapted from another GitHub Gist that I found here. You will probably need to modify the following variables. plexDatabase plexPlistFile backupDirectory Pay attention to lines 17 ~ 21. These refer to the possibility that your script may not complete if your machine can go to sleep.
